summary: Anime is a type of animation that comes from Japan. It can be drawn by hand or made on a computer. In Japan, the word "anime" describes all animation, but outside Japan, it specifically means Japanese animation. This style of animation started in the 1960s and has become very popular worldwide. Anime is often based on comics, novels, or video games. It has unique art styles, with big, expressive eyes as a common feature. There are many anime production companies, and they make shows for different audiences. Anime is now a big part of popular culture around the world.
title: Anime
